TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SerializedModule extends WasmerSharp.WasmerNativeHandle

Docs.summary: Modules can either be serialized to byte arrays, or created from a serialized state (byte arrays). This class provides this bridge.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class WasmerSharp.Module Deserialize() cil managed

Docs.returns: Returns an instance of a Module, or null on error. You can use the LastError error property to get details on the error.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class WasmerSharp.SerializedModule FromBytes(unsigned int8[] buffer) cil managed

Docs.param: Array of bytes containing the serialized module.
Docs.summary: Creates a new SerializedModule from the provided byte array
Docs.returns: Returns null on error, or an instance of SerializeModule on success. You can use the LastError error property to get details on the error.

MemberSignature.Value: public static WasmerSharp.SerializedModule FromBytes (IntPtr bytes, uint len);
.method public static hidebysig class WasmerSharp.SerializedModule FromBytes(native int bytes, unsigned int32 len) cil managed

Docs.param: Pointer to a region in memory containing the serialized module.
The number of bytes toe process from the buffer
Docs.summary: Creates a new SerializedModule from the provided buffer.
Docs.returns: Returns null on error, or an instance of SerializeModule on success. You can use the LastError error property to get details on the error.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance unsigned int8[] GetModuleBytes() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the serialized module as a byte array.
Docs.returns: The byte array for this serialized module
